Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
model.Reservation
public class Reservation extends Object
The reservation model class.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Reservation(String guest, int checkIn, int checkOut, Room room)
    Constructs a reservation given the guest's name, the check-in date, the check-out date, the reserved room, and the discount code.
